item.title: About Eric Peña
item.description: Photo Credit: Samuel Sung About Me EMAIL: eric.pena@binghamton.edu Complex Systems Science graduate student and Clifford D. Clark Diversity Fellow at State University of New York at Binghamton. Current Projects Complexity in Conway’s Game of Life and other Life-Like Cellular Automata I will be giving a talk at NERCCS2021 in May. Bayesian Sparse Network Reconstruction I will be presenting a poster at NERCCS2021 in May. Cellular Automata Optimization using Genetic Algorithms Won an Honorable Mention Award for Best Poster at NERCCS2020 Website Portfolio In Progress… Experience Statistics and Probability Teacher, SUNY Binghamton Net Revenue Management Data Analyst, Diageo Engineer, H.
